name: Wai Wai Jansou
overview: Wai Wai Jansou (aka Waiwai Jong Sou) is a mahjong game that features 5 different kind of boards and 5 different kind of mahjong tiles. The player can choose at the beginning 3 different opponents and the match rules. The release includes comes in a box that features the game and 2 mahjong controllers. The peculiar thing if this game is the special controller that have a LCD screen in which the player can see his mahjong tiles and using the multitap up to four human players can play at the same time.
